page.title: 20THE COTSWOLD WAY
page.content: {by Lucy Sabin.} In September our family started the {Cotswold Way}Walk.We met at the Red Lion and drove to{Moreton,}where we continued by minibus to our finishing point of last time.Most of the walks were about nine miles long.We saw {Broadway Tower},{The Somerset} {Monument},{Severn Bridge}and{River}, and{The Black Mountains of Wales}on our way.Sometimes we had to wear oilskins but I didn't like this as it was sweaty.We usually ate our packed lunch in a pub garden.The signs along the route were good and they were marked with a{white dot}.On the last walk, which was in April, we stayed the night in a Youth Hostel in{Bath} and it was great fun.Throughout the journey we had counted one hundred and twelve stiles.
